Index.meta_title: SaaS Template - The perfect SaaS template to build and scale your business with ease.
Index.meta_description: A free and open-source landing page template for your SaaS business, built with React, TypeScript, Shadcn UI, and Tailwind CSS.

Hero.title: The perfect <important>SaaS template</important> to build and scale your business with ease.
Hero.description: A free and open-source landing page template for your SaaS business, built with React, TypeScript, Shadcn UI, and Tailwind CSS.

HowItWorks.section_subtitle: Get your dream product in 3 simple steps
HowItWorks.step1_description: Select a wall art, vase, pillow case, or any product you desire. Different size and material options are waiting for you.
HowItWorks.step2_description: Describe your dream design with words. Our AI technology creates a unique and personalized design just for you.
HowItWorks.step3_description: Love your one-of-a-kind product? Order with a single click and we'll deliver it to your doorstep.

Features.section_title: Unlock the Full Potential of the SaaS Template
Features.section_description: A free and open-source landing page template for your SaaS business, built with React, TypeScript, Shadcn UI, and Tailwind CSS.
Features.feature_description: A free and open-source landing page template for your SaaS business, built with React, TypeScript, Shadcn UI, and Tailwind CSS.

ProtectFallback.not_enough_permission: You do not have the permissions to perform this action

SignIn.meta_description: Seamlessly sign in to your account with our user-friendly login process.

SignUp.meta_description: Effortlessly create an account through our intuitive sign-up process.

Dashboard.meta_description: A free and open-source landing page template for your SaaS business, built with Next.js, TypeScript, Shadcn UI, and Tailwind CSS.

DashboardIndex.message_state_description: You can customize this page by editing the file at dashboard/page.tsx
DashboardIndex.message_state_alternative: Want more features and the latest updates from Next.js 16? Try <url></url>.

UserProfile.title_bar_description: View and manage your user profile

Billing.current_section_description: Adjust your payment plan to best suit your requirements

CheckoutConfirmation.message_state_description: Your payment has been successfully processed. Thank you for your purchase!

Todos.title_bar_description: View and manage your todo list

AddTodo.add_todo_section_description: Fill in the form below to create a new todo

EditTodo.edit_todo_section_description: Fill in the form below to edit the todo

TodoForm.title_description: Enter a descriptive title for your todo.
TodoForm.message_description: Enter a detailed message for your todo.

Products.meta_description: Choose your product, size and frame for your dream design
Products.page_description: Which product would you like to see your design on?
Products.product_wall_art_description: Create a unique wall decoration with your custom design

Design.welcome_message: Hello! How can I help you? Describe your desired design or let's chat for inspiration.
Design.generating_image: Your image is being generated, please wait...
Design.image_generated: Here's your image! Do you like it?
Design.placeholder_generate: E.g., 'Create an abstract artwork in purple and pink tones' or 'Minimalist geometric shapes'
Design.placeholder_inspiration: E.g., 'Suggest a calm design for bedroom' or 'Give ideas about modern office decoration'
Design.wait_for_generation: Image is being generated, please wait...
Design.hint: Shift + Enter for new line, Enter to send
Design.no_images_yet:
No images generated yet.
Specify your requests in the chat area above.
Design.your_prompt: You Created This With These Feelings
Design.credit_warning: This action will consume 1 Art Credit
Design.insufficient_credits: Insufficient Art Credits! You need at least 1 Art Credit to generate images. Please purchase credits or upgrade your subscription plan.
Design.preview_info: You can make final checks and complete your order on the payment page.
Design.analyzing_details: Analyzing details and preparing color palette...
Design.crafting_unique: Preparing a piece that only you will have in the world...
Design.finalizing: Finalizing your masterpiece, just a few more seconds...
Design.generation_timeout: Image generation is taking longer than expected. Please check the "Previously Created" section.

Checkout.page_description: Review your order details and complete payment
Checkout.secure_payment_info: Your payment is protected with SSL certificate

CheckoutSuccess.success_description: Your order has been received and is being prepared. Shipping information will be sent to your email shortly.
CheckoutSuccess.step1: Your design will be printed in high quality by our expert team
CheckoutSuccess.step2: Your product will be carefully packaged and shipped
CheckoutSuccess.step3: It will be at your door within 2-3 business days

CheckoutFailed.failed_description: There was an issue with your payment. Please check your information and try again.

PurchaseCredits.meta_description: Purchase Art Credits and create unlimited designs
PurchaseCredits.page_description: Top up Art Credits to create more designs
PurchaseCredits.amount_label: How many Art Credits would you like?
PurchaseCredits.success_message: Your Art Credits have been added to your account
PurchaseCredits.redirect_message: Redirecting to design page in {seconds} seconds...
PurchaseCredits.failed_message: Your payment could not be completed. Please try again or contact customer support.
